wogwt.translatable.http
Class SubmitUpdater

java.lang.Object
  wogwt.translatable.http.Updater
      wogwt.translatable.http.SubmitUpdater
Direct Known Subclasses:
SubmitOnChangeListener, SubmitOnClickListener
public abstract class SubmitUpdater
extends Updater

Sends the all the form values to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response. This class provides the basic functionality that supports it's descendants,
